table.name: vtiger_equipment
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_equipment` ( `equipmentid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `equipment_sl_no` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`equipmentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_equipmentcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_equipmentcf` ( `equipmentid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`equipmentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
